attributes.action: put to parliament that any future reforms, acts, bills,taxes imposed on the taxpayer should be applied to MP's and Civil Servants at the same time.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of Parliament are voted in to represent the 'ordinary ' citizen, to act in accordance and within the laws of this country. To pass Bills and reforms to improve our Democracy. Why is it our representatives, MP's and Civil Servants, seem to live under different rules and values? If representatives from all parties agree to pass reforms then they should comply by those decisions too and hence dispel the disparities that seem to prevail.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
